revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Hak5 |model=WiFi Pineapple |revision=Mark V |upc=748252507303 |asin= |price=99 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |est_release_date=10/12/2013 |fcc_date=10/21/2013 |fcc_id=2AA52MK5 |type=WiFi security auditing tool |pwr_v=5-12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR9331 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25Q128FVSG |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=H5PS5162GFR-Y5C |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag=no |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, external,, (115200 8N1) |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9331 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=SMA |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |wi2_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi2_chip1_model=RTL8187L |wi2_chip2_brand=Realtek |wi2_chip2_model=RTL8225 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi2_ant_conn=SMA |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Richwave;RTC6691;187, 6691, A305;1;,,, 2-Port USB Hub Controller and Card Reader;Alcor Micro;AU6350;ALCOR, AU6350, A41-MGL-GR, H7S582-IF, 1325TDJ;1; |flags=Micro SD Card slot |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=Pineapple |default_ssid_regex=^Pineapple$ |default_ip=172.16.42.1 |default_user=root |default_pass=change_on_install |oui=00:13:37 |oui_eth=00:13:37 }}
"MK5", "V1.3", and a date code of "3213" (Aug. 2013) is silkscreened on the FCC EUT's board.. :as well as on the boards shown on ''Pentura Labs'' blog + ''Hak5 Mark V Exposed'' :video (see below for both). Default settings are as per [https://www.wifipineapple.com/mk5/booklet.pdf QSG].
===Specifications=== *[http://penturalabs.wordpress.com/2013/10/27/naked-wifi-pineapple-mark-v/ ''Naked WiFi Pineapple Mark V!'' on '''Pentura Labs''' blog] :(excellent internal images and general info dump) :Most useful specifications are per this blog post. :*[[Winbond]] W25Q128FVSG (8MB) SPI Flash + [[Hynix]] H5PS5162GFR-Y5C (64MB) RAM :*[[Realtek]] RTL8225 RF IC + [[Richwave]] RTC6691 PA IC for the RTL8187L :*[[Alcor Micro]] AU6350 - USB 2.0 Hub + Card Reader on the board :*00:13:37 OUI on board MAC label, presumed to be used for all interfaces
===Forums threads=== *[https://forums.hak5.org/index.php?/forum/78-mark-v/ ''Mark V forum'' on the '''Hak5 forums''']
===Links=== *[http://hakshop.myshopify.com/collections/wifi-pineapple/products/wifi-pineapple ''WiFi Pineapple Mark V Standard'' on the '''HakShop'''] *[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=swlPEeQDds4 ''(NSFW) 5 Days of Mark V (part 5) - WiFi Pineapple Exposed'' on '''YouTube'''] *[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wkrI_TNTWU0 ''Ultimate Peter'''s unboxing video on '''YouTube''']
===Included power supply, per FCC data=== {{hasPowerSupply |brand=unknown |model=BX-0901500 |input_v=100-240 |input_a=0.5 |input_c=AC |input_hz=50/60 |input_conn=NEMA 1-15P |output_v=9 |output_a=1.5 |output_c=DC |output_conn=barrel |style=large, vertical }}
